scenes.label: *start

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Hacking my way through every red light, I went south towards Okubo.
There was no sign of JUNO, but the CFD police car was still right behind us.
Pollon, I calculated the drone launch location!
That was further away than Okubo. We'd have to get the drone from Cross.
Hacking the traffic lights wasn't buying us enough time. We needed another idea.
We gotta get from Okubo to the National Stadium as quickly as possible! Give us a hand, will ya!

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Think we could close up some roads, Riko?

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Only partially, I think. We'd need assistance from other divisions, though.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Yeah. But don't get me wrong. I'm only helping him because it might help someone else!

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Let's talk to the chief about this!

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: The police car changed direction and disappeared from sight.
Cross! We're taking the drone! Meet you at the intersection in Kitashinjuku! District 1!
The intersection was only about 150m ahead.
We'll take it from ya while we're rolling! That'll save us some time!

scenes.label: *mangatest

texts: Momo! Think you can grab the drone?!
I saw Cross on his graper up ahead.

texts.captiontext: Leave it to me!

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: We entered the intersection at a high speed...

texts.captiontext: I saw Cross on his graper up ahead.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: ...And turned in the middle of it.

texts.captiontext: We entered the intersection at a high speed...

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: We were inches from crashing out.

texts.captiontext: ...And turned in the middle of it.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: The slightest mistake could kill us both. I was tense as all hell, but concentrated as best I could.

texts.captiontext: We were inches from crashing out.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: Momo stretched out her upper body as she reached out towards Cross's graper.

texts.captiontext: The slightest mistake could kill us both. I was tense as all hell, but concentrated as best I could.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: She grabbed hold of the drone case attached to his waist...

texts.captiontext: Momo stretched out her upper body as she reached out towards Cross's graper.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: ...and Cross undid the lock holding it in place.

texts.captiontext: She grabbed hold of the drone case attached to his waist...

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: I could feel the weight of the drone adding to my graper's centrifugal force.

texts.captiontext: ...and Cross undid the lock holding it in place.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: I could feel the weight of the drone adding to my graper's centrifugal force.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: Pollon!

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: We pulled out of the intersection, then drove south on Kotakibashi Street. Cross sped off in the opposite direction.

texts.captiontext: Momo sat back down.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: We got the drone! How's your end?

texts.captiontext: We pulled out of the intersection, then drove south on Kotakibashi Street. Cross sped off in the opposite direction.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: We got the drone! How's your end?

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: Here's a tentative route.\nI'll navigate and give you updates.

texts.captiontext: We did what we could!

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: I checked the route, then used my keyboard to adjust my graper's settings, prioritizing speed.

texts.captiontext: Here's a tentative route.\nI'll navigate and give you updates.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: I checked the route, then used my keyboard to adjust my graper's settings, prioritizing speed.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: Hold tight, Momo!

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: I rushed through the streets. The traffic restrictions had totally emptied them out.

texts.captiontext: Okay!

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: We were getting faster and faster, and ended up bombing it at 200km/h.

texts.captiontext: I rushed through the streets. The traffic restrictions had totally emptied them out.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: If either of us fell of, we'd die instantly. I couldn't relax for a second.

texts.captiontext: We were getting faster and faster, and ended up bombing it at 200km/h.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: If either of us fell of, we'd die instantly. I couldn't relax for a second.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: Oz, could you send us the pilot's BMI password?

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts.captiontext: Oz, could you send us the pilot's BMI password?

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: I was going to ask for it once I'd set up the new channel, but getting it now would save more time.

texts.captiontext: Her timing impressed me.

chromatic.runLineStr: [chromatic rx=1 ry=1 gx=1 gy=1 bx=1 by=1 bs=0.996 rs=1.004][waitmode text=false][msgwin type=%type|1][mangatriggermode state=true][macropop]

texts: You're almost there! Start slowing down.

texts.captiontext: Will do.
